S.FORM: Michael Adams tatama, nalecuhan i 19 bulad 1 a demiad, 1963 a mihcaan, Michael Adams, miunduay. Michael Adams unu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, u misimaw zikuzay mimaliay. Michael Adams i 1985 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 3 ku uwac atu silsil 66, namapili' tu nu Sacramento Kings putiput. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Lists of National Basketball Association players
